Uses of Class
jam.global.GlobalException

Packages that use GlobalException
jam Root package for the Jam software package. 
jam.data.control Dialogs for manipulating histograms, gates, scalers, real-time monitors, and data parameters. 
jam.global Classes containing application status information and useful methods that any class in Jam may use. 
jam.sort Classes for controlling the retrieval, sorting and storage of data, including the user-extensible jam.sort.SortRoutine.

Uses of GlobalException in jam.data.control
 

Methods in jam.data.control that throw GlobalException
 void ScalerControl.read()
          Read the scaler values send out command to read scalers which sould be recieved by VMECommunication VME should then send a command to CAMAC to read the scalers, when VME recieves back the scaler values it calls Distribute event which will call our update method.
 void ScalerControl.zero()
          zero scalers, call broadcast which will sent it to the class that will zero the camac crate scalers.
 void HistogramControl.zeroAll()
          Zero all the histograms Loops through the histograms zeroing them in turn
